mapper.sql: partner_no, partner_name, partner_date, partner_registcapital, partner_list, partner_scale, partner_addr, partner_webddr, partner_tech, partner_product, partner_channel, partner_turnover, partner_region, partner_industry, status, del_status, create_time, update_time, creater,creater_identity, updater, remark,proj_id
mapper.select:
select * from epartner
partner_name like "%"#{partnerName}"%"
or partner_product like "%"#{partnerProduct}"%"
or partner_region like "%"#{partnerRegion}"%"
or Partner_industry like "%"#{partnerIndustry}"%"

select
from epartner WHERE del_status=0
and status=0
and partner_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{partnerName}, '%')
and partner_product LIKE CONCAT('%', #{partnerProduct}, '%')
and partner_region LIKE CONCAT('%', #{partnerRegion}, '%')
and Partner_industry LIKE CONCAT('%', #{partnerIndustry}, '%')

select
from epartner where partner_no = #{partnerNo,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND status = 0

select
from epartner where status = 0 AND del_status=0
and partner_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{partnerName}, '%')
and partner_product LIKE CONCAT('%', #{partnerProduct}, '%')
and partner_region LIKE CONCAT('%', #{partnerRegion}, '%')
and Partner_industry LIKE CONCAT('%', #{partnerIndustry}, '%')
mapper.insert: insert into epartner (partner_no, partner_name, partner_date, partner_registcapital, partner_list, partner_scale, partner_addr, partner_webddr, partner_tech, partner_product, partner_channel, partner_turnover, partner_region, partner_industry, status, del_status, create_time, update_time, creater,creater_identity, updater, remark,proj_id ) values (#{partnerNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{partnerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partnerDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partnerRegistcapital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partnerList,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{partnerScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partnerAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partnerWebddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partnerTech,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partnerProduct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partnerChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partnerTurnover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partnerRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partnerIndustry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{createrIdentity,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,#{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{projId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

mapper.update:
update epartner
partner_name = #{partnerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
partner_date = #{partnerDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
partner_registcapital = #{partnerRegistcapital,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
partner_list = #{partnerList,jdbcType=INTEGER},
partner_scale = #{partnerScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
partner_addr = #{partnerAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
partner_webddr = #{partnerWebddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
partner_tech = #{partnerTech,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
partner_product = #{partnerProduct,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
partner_channel = #{partnerChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
partner_turnover = #{partnerTurnover,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
partner_region = #{partnerRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
partner_industry = #{partnerIndustry,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
del_status = #{delStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creater = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creater_identity = #{createrIdentity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
updater = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
proj_id = #{projId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where partner_no = #{partnerNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update epartner set partner_name = #{partnerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, partner_date = #{partnerDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, partner_registcapital = #{partnerRegistcapital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, partner_list = #{partnerList,jdbcType=INTEGER}, partner_scale = #{partnerScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, partner_addr = #{partnerAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, partner_webddr = #{partnerWebddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, partner_tech = #{partnerTech,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, partner_product = #{partnerProduct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, partner_channel = #{partnerChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, partner_turnover = #{partnerTurnover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, partner_region = #{partnerRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, partner_industry = #{partnerIndustry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, del_status = #{delStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creater = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creater_identity = #{createrIdentity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updater = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proj_id = #{projId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where partner_no = #{partnerNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}
UPDATE epartner AS e SET e.`status`=#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE e.`partner_no`=#{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER};
UPDATE epartner AS e SET e.`del_status`=1 WHERE e.`partner_no`=#{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER};

select
distinct
from epartner
order by ${orderByClause}

partner_no = #{record.partnerNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.select: SELECT f.`file_path` FROM epartner AS e LEFT JOIN file_info AS f ON e.`partner_no`=f.`rel_doc_id` WHERE e.partner_no = #{partnerNo,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND e.`status`=0 AND f.`status`=0;
SELECT f.`file_name` FROM epartner AS e LEFT JOIN file_info AS f ON e.`partner_no`=f.`rel_doc_id` WHERE e.partner_no = #{partnerNo,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND e.`status`=0 AND f.`status`=0;
mapper.update: UPDATE file_info AS f SET f.`status`=1 WHERE f.`rel_doc_id`=#{partnerNo,jdbcType=INTEGER};
UPDATE file_info AS f SET f.`last_download_user`= #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE f.`rel_doc_id`=#{partnerNo,jdbcType=INTEGER};
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM epartner where status=0 AND del_status=0
